name: Invaders
description:
Tap/click to get a new one

A tweetcart, and my first mint using the new breadfond!

This tweetcart is based on the core concept of seed looping. In this case, I wanted to see if I could develop a kind of rudimentary cellular automata using extremely simple rules + seed looping. It worked and was interesting, but further tweaking led me to this point, which makes me think of folding proteins, or invading cells.


creator: Andrew E. Brereton
date: 2022-03-16
twitter: @aebrer
website: aebrer.xyz
medium: Pico-8, Lua, Tweetcart


Source Code (191 characters):
```
r=rnd
b=srand
for i=0,15do pal(i,r(32)-16,1)end
s=r(-1)cls()::_::
x=r(32)+48y=r(32)+48for i=0,r(99)do
pset(x,y,r(6))x+=r(4)-2y+=r(4)-2
circ(x,y,r(1)+.5,pget(x,y)-1)end
if(r()>.999)b(s)
goto _
```
